duties_responsibilities.duty: Generate revenue from sales to new and existing clients
Build relationships with CEOs, CFOs, and other executives of leading VC-backed private companies
Act as a trusted advisor helping private companies navigate the secondary equity landscape
Build referral networks with leading law firms, investment banks, and other channel partners
Develop deep familiarity with NPM’s products and solutions
Champion and market NPM to private companies globally
Act as a thought leader and steward of NPM, helping to maintain NPM’s presence in the market
Collaborate with sales peers to support team and company-wide goals
Work cross-functionally with Product, Marketing, Operations, Technology, Legal, and Compliance
